posts.post_content:
Awesome, unique card.  Has a bit of paper loss on the reverse that luckily doesn't obscure much text.

$3,200 shipped and insured via USPS Registered Mail.

I've done a ton of transactions here, but never one this big.  If you'd like to buy but are wary of the doing such a large transaction, I'm sure we can find a suitable escrow.

High res scans available to anyone with serious interest in buying.   Just shoot me a PM with your email address.

Thanks for looking!
Hell of a card, I've never seen one like that :eek:
WOW! That is really hard on my eyes. Nice card.

[quote name="Gradedcardman" post=1543064]Gives me a headache !![/QUOTE]
It's like watching a 3-D movie without the 3-D glasses.  :D

That card looks fine to me.

del howard, matty mcintyre, and now this one!:eek:   

the del and McIntyre are a little more "double struck"   , but I value them at 5 k +:D


nice card and good luck with the sale:)
